```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(tsibble)
library(feasts)
```


```{r}
truckee <- read_csv(here("data", "truckee_river.csv"), skip = 29) %>% 
  slice(-1) %>% 
  select(datetime, discharge_cfs) %>% 
  mutate(date = lubridate::mdy(datetime),
         discharge_cfs = as.numeric(discharge_cfs))

truckee_ts <- truckee %>% 
  as_tsibble(key = NULL, index = date)

truckee_ts %>% 
  gg_season(discharge_cfs)

ggplot(data = truckee_ts,
       aes(x = date,
           y = discharge_cfs)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
inputPanel(
  dateRangeInput(inputId = "dates", 
                 label = "Select date range:",
                 min = "2010-01-01",
                 max = "2021-01-24",
                 start = "2010-01-01",
                 end = "2021-01-24",
                 format = "yyyy-mm-dd")
  )

truckee_react <- reactive({
  
  truckee_ts %>% 
    filter(date >= input$dates[1],
           date <= input$dates[2])
})

renderPlot({
  
  ggplot(data = truckee_react(), aes(x = date, y = discharge_cfs)) +
    geom_line()
  
  
})

```
